website_summaries.verdict: A durable, high-quality piece of equipment that provides a wide variety of exercise options.
pros: Powder coated steel tube frame with 400 lb
2 adjustable handle bars with foam rollers allows for exercise in 7 different mounting positions
Can bolt to the floor for extra stability

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product...it seems almost overkill for home equipment, any gym would be honored to have it, but that's what makes it so great. There's no hesitation or lack of trust on this product. I've found it to be perfect to knock out essential exercises in the privacy of your home during any given 20 min span of free time you find. I stand 6' and the height of the arm pads is just fine, the pull up bar is fine too I just bend my knees a little to get full motion.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality all the way
customer_reviews.text: Extremely solidly built -- gym quality equipment all the way. I'm extremely pleased with stand, it's built like a mac truck and it appears the padded portions are going to be very durable. A lot of home gym gear claims to be professional quality -- this piece is the real deal. The only thing to be aware of is that the dip handle are pretty large. I wear extra-large gloves, and even in my big hands the dip hands feel large. So people with smaller hands be aware of this. However, it doesn't really impede my dips. In every other respect, I'm super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: The artificial leather parts are looking and feeling like very high quality material
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and assembled. Very clear instructions - well packed parts. The artificial leather parts are looking and feeling like very high quality material. The handles are all covered with high quality dense type of material, that is not too soft and allows for good grip, not standard foam at all - i'm expecting it work for years without much wear and tear. We'll see. Overall it looks and feels like high quality piece of gear. I'm average size 5'9'', 185lbs. This thing fits perfectly and it is very sturdy - works well free standing, no need to fasten it to the floor. Nice hefty member of the gym equipment family;)
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy workstation!
customer_reviews.text: They lose a star from me because the "tools" they included to assemble this thing bent and made it all the more difficult to put this thing together. All-in-all, it's a great product but they should offer an assembly option, which I always select but couldn't because it was not offered. And they should include a drill bit, in order to make it easier for some (with a drill) to put this together.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Too thick pull ups bars, Sturdy as hell
customer_reviews.text: Don’t take me wrong, it is the beefy and stable, for me the fatal flaw is that the bars for the pull ups and chin ups are too big, as far as my understanding is recommended 1 in diameter. This is approx 2 to 2.5 inches, so you kinda grabbing the bars from your fingers instead of full hand grip
customer_reviews.author: LPL

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Power Tower
customer_reviews.text: The Power Tower is a solid piece of exercise equipment. Minimum movement only when used extremely aggressively. I am 5'9" and weigh 200 lbs and have no problem using any of the functions. My only issue would be that it is meant for indoors only and I want to use it outside in the sun. It is working great for me right now, but I keep it covered when I'm not using it. Hopefully, it will stand the test of time as I believe it will. Worth the money for a solid reliable piece of equipment that functions perfectly for what it's designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E.

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly, unsteady and parts that do not fit.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality metal, but poor construction. Some parts do not sit flush when fastened which makes it very wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Allen

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are easy to understand and it doesn't take to long to ...
customer_reviews.text: Well priced and highly durable. The instructions are easy to understand and it doesn't take to long to setup. It holds up to 400 lbs which is plenty for most. It will allow you to work full body (Pull ups, Chin ups, Dips, different elevated levels of push ups, Inverted row, leg lifts, knee lifts, and single leg squats. Not to heavy (150lbs) and very stable. Recommend about 8 ft ceiling for your pull ups and about 5-6 ft. of space around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, a beast if a tower.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I am 220 lbs and it holds me like a champ. Only time it has swayed is when I was trying to get some assist bands under my feet and I stepped off stool accidentally and went to the side. It rocked a bit but hardly at all. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is heavier. Pads are very comfortable and easy to adjust the push up handles. Easy to put together and it can he bolted to the floor if you are trying to do pull ups and move side to side or if you are doing weighted pull ups and need extra support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast, very well made, not your average sporting goods store tower. this is very industrial, very heavy and well thought out in its design. Just use your personal car tool box for this to get everything tight and don't use the supplied flat metal multi tools that come with it. This tower is very heavy duty, something you would see in a gym not a house or garage. It's better then my capabilities, i'll have to grow into this tower. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: jdv500

customer_reviews.title: Solid and complete core/upper body workout gym
customer_reviews.text: This is a commercial grade home gym. Very easy to assemble with clear instructions. Very small footprint compared to other multi-functional workout equipment. This is perfect for building strong core while getting toned up and gaining upper body strength. I like the fact that it can also be incorporated with stretch exercises. Overall, this is equipment is very well designed and built to last. I highly recommend this gym for someone who like to stay fit without leaving home and no injuries.
customer_reviews.author: A.Z C

customer_reviews.title: This item ships in two boxes, and may arrive separately.
customer_reviews.text: The description says that this comes in two boxes and that the boxes might not arrive at the same time. I didn't know that when I ordered it. When only one box showed up, I thought I was going to have to start making phone calls or end up returning it. The 2nd box showed up the next day. So don't worry if both boxes don't arrive together. The unit itself is solid and handles my 260lbs of fat. Now I just have to actually start using it. Day One starts today! Good luck to all of us on our workout journey to get Hot & Big!
customer_reviews.author: bababooey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and brand
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased from FitnessReality multiple times and they never disappoint. The product came on time, nicely packaged and had clear assembly instructions. Super useful for a home gym. I definitely recommend this product and other products of this brand including their squat rack, benches,...
customer_reviews.author: Meysam

customer_reviews.title: Best power tower
customer_reviews.text: Very amazing power tower. I dont even need to bolt it down. Very stable. The dip bars and pullup bars are very thick! It will improve grip strength alot more than thin bars so i see this as a plus. Unless you have very small hands i guess. I payed someone else to install so idk how hard it was to setup. I do not regret buying this. I weigh 200lbs if anyone was wondering. Only thing that was bad was the logo sticker. It came off 3rd day of use, but who cares about that?
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful piece of equipment with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, its sturdy and well built. Its heavy enough where I can attach resistance bands to it and use it as an anchor. The directions to put it together was easy enough, loved that they seperated all hardware to each step. Reason why I gave it four stars is the backrest does not give support when doing legs lifts, at least for me 5ft 10in. Really have no idea why they didn't make it a little longer. Ive been using the detachable handles/cushions as support for my lower back. I think as I strengthen my core, itll become less a problem.. Otherwise awesome piece of equipment, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made, well-designed piece of equipment. Would give it 6 stars if I could. Easy to put together. Used it now for ~4 months. Many of the exercises I perform are better than what I can do at the public gym. REALLY glad I spent the extra money and bought this piece of equipment over the myriad of other options I considered.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Fits in tight spaces!
customer_reviews.text: This is 25" by about 6', so it fits in a narrow space, which is just what I wanted. It's also very sturdy. I'm 5'9 180, and there's no wobble at all. Just make sure you screw those bolts on tight! Assembling this thing was really fun. The instructions are good, and the way they lay out all the bolts is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ida B. Forkenster

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is really sturdy. It took a while to narrow it down to which power tower i wanted. Ultimately i chose this one because of the higher weight limit and the sturdy design. It didn't look like it would be flimsy and flexy. It's not. It's very sturdy and awesome. I weigh about 230lbs and i do weighted pull ups and dips with no flexing or wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the Rest of Us
customer_reviews.text: I am a fat old lady. But, I keep trying. My son son goes to a gym every day. He is not fat. He is in outstanding shape per my precious DIL. Ha! My husband bought this at my request. He likes to cheer me on. My son says it’s a REALLY good piece of equipment. When it comes back in stock, you should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: SOEXCITEDUSA

customer_reviews.title: When You Need Strong and Steady, This Is The One To Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fitness Reality X-Class High Capacity Multi-Function Power Tower is THE choice when you need strong and steady. + Excellent instructions for easy assembly. + Ergonomic design. + High-quality industrial-level materials. + Rock-solid stability. + Does everything as advertised, and more. + Is well-worth the extra expense.
customer_reviews.author: gmouhere

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid Peace of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for about twenty people to use and it gets a lot of use. This is a very solidly built machine. It works good and is very stable even for very large individuals. So far I haven't noticed any wear and tear on the machine. Every part of it is well made and looks like it will last a very long time. If you want to move it make sure you have a couple of people to help it is heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was great. Arrived in two boxes, the bigger one was somewhat heavy but workable. I assembled it in a little over an hour. Pieces and directions were very organized. The equipment is very sturdy and stable. I’m 5’11” 180 lbs and have no trouble with wobble on any of the stations. I have only had the equipment for a few weeks and it has worked as advertised. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Very solid piece of equipment. Well packaged too. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very solid piece of equipment. Well packaged too. I am really impressed to get something of this build quality at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Very solid equipment
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is also straightforward, better do the job with a helper. Only once it was difficult to insert a bolt, but it turns out if you loose the previously tightened bolts, you will be good to go. I will keep it and no doubt it will last years to go.
customer_reviews.author: regular customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with my order..worth the higher price!
customer_reviews.text: Received my delivery promptly..product arrived neatly boxed, no parts were missing, everything was sealed neatly and organized. Assembly instructions were simple and complete. Hardware includes assembly tools, but it is much easier to use your own ratchet set tools if you have them. I was able to assemble this by myself no problem. Now I have no excuse not to get in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Robinson

customer_reviews.title: As good as commercial equipment
customer_reviews.text: I own a private personal training studio and this piece is as nice as any commercial piece I have! Thick gauge steel, and padding is excellent, great quality piece!
customer_reviews.author: BeastMode

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy with a solid feel. All screws labeled and instructions easy to follow. Unit was well packaged and arrived in good condition, although it’s a very heavy unit. You may need help assembling as some parts require holding multiple peaces while inserting screws. Already got my fist workout on it...but it was building it...lol.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several months now and it seems well built as well as very stable. I'm 6' and 220 lbs and this unit feels like it doesn't know I'm there. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: CorvetteZR1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy without floor bolts
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two separate boxes (one day apart), this piece of equipment is sturdy and high quality. Assembly was straightforward, instructions were accurate, and all parts were included. It's worth mentioning that the space between the dip bars is slightly more narrow when compared to similar stands I've used in the gym, but it's still comfortable enough to get a full range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: This tower is the best.
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute beast for construction! Well thought out and simple to put together. It comes in a very heavy box and parts are pretty heavy...which is exactly the point of quality steel parts.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Let me describe it this way; it took me roughly the same time to remove the parts from the boxes as it did to assembly. And this goes to show how great the packaging is and how easy and thorough the assembly instructions are. I assembled it on my own using just the tools provided, super sturdy and extremely versatile in terms of exercises. I'm 6'2 and 210 pounds and it barely moves (without having it pinned to the ground). Top quality product, recommending without a second thought
customer_reviews.author: Dimitris

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Took my time assembling - very easy. I am 5'10" and weigh 205 pounds - this thing is sturdy and does not rock - and I did not anchor it to the floor. It's a great looking piece of equipment too!
customer_reviews.author: mario1man

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality- better than many gyms
customer_reviews.text: Unit is incredibly well made. I did have a problem with two of the bolt holes and had to file the inside a little. Other than that it is well machined. The unit is really heavy and sturdy and it came well packed. I can't recommend this unit enough, very satisfied. Also, I assembled it by myself with very little help from my husband. A metric socket set helps immensely though.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Gedney

customer_reviews.title: the reason this thing is heavy and sturdy. this is a 5 star well made product
customer_reviews.text: i bought a 150 dollar one similar to this but it was too light and every time i would do pull up or dip, it would lean almost to the point of tipping over.this one does NOT shake or tilt or any of that non sence. the reason this thing is heavy and sturdy. this is a 5 star well made product. I wished i would of bought this from the get go. Only con i had was two minor scratches on the stand, but its not that big of a deal for me, all in all everything was good.
customer_reviews.author: Wassam

customer_reviews.title: This thing is STURDY! It looks like a lot to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is STURDY! It looks like a lot to put together but the directions are the best I've seen in a long time, and I've put 100's of things together. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: David Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, professional gym equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, professional gym equipment. Love love love it. Would buy again. Came perfectly packaged and protected. Way better than most things these days
customer_reviews.author: vspeed737

customer_reviews.title: Great tower. its an expensive kit
customer_reviews.text: Great tower. its an expensive kit, but the quality of the fit and finish is excellent. The setup process was very straightforward and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Deutsche Man

customer_reviews.title: Missing and damaged parts
customer_reviews.text: This product came with missing and damage parts. There is a support number to call, however, you get a message that to due to COVID there is no one to answer the phones. Was very excited to start working out but with the missing part I am unable to use this equipment. Very disappointed in the quality and experience for the price of this equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Review

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Supreme quality, well engineered, very good instructions and super sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: puffer

customer_reviews.title: Best Power Tower on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Power Tower is Awesome, totally sturdy and will fit in your basement. This is the pull-up stand your looking for, gym quality. Ships in 2 separate boxes that arrived together. Love this stand, but use two socket wrenches when assembling it will speed up putting together, directions are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive Entire Package?
customer_reviews.text: We are writing to make customers aware that we only received 1 of 2 packages. We are currently working with Paradigm Health & Wellness 1-866-924-1688 to resolve our current issue. We will update this review once transaction is complete. Thank You Jesse Sanchez
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems the Reality X makes great products. This is my second purchase of their equipment and really impressed
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out design.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pro model heavy duty machine. It’s very sturdy even-though mine is not fastened to the floor which you could do if you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Jman

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty power tower. Ships in a couple of boxes, but is easy to put together. This is solid set-up that will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a rock
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. Pleased we chose this one even though it was more expensive than others we considered. Very pleased we spent the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and heavyvduty. The thing I dislike is the pull up bar width is difficult for me the supports are right atvthe position Inwould prefer to have my hands. Additionally, the grip are very wide Ibwould have prefered a smaller diameter. These are my only complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty tower. Took about 2 hours to put together by myself. Gym quality!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Moschell

customer_reviews.title: Defective product and non-existent support
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective part that is preventing full assembly of the product. Attempted to contact customer support and for more than two full weeks nobody responds to either emails or phone calls. Would have been a good product if a good company was standing behind it!
customer_reviews.author: Moataz Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is as solid as it looks and then some. Very impressed with the overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Morten Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I looked forever for a pullup/dip rack. Found this one and it must weigh 500 lbs!! Don't spend more on one. This is it. Extremely well made, very sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assembly very solid and heavy product I'm really impressed this thing is really good
customer_reviews.author: Jorge luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and commercial grade quality. Instructions were easy to follow and assemble. You will require an extra pair of hands in certain areas. Only con, Dips bar as others suggested is a bit bulky for normal hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This is the best I have seen for a home. It is exactly what I was wanting. I can’t stand the power towers that wobble and shake, this one doesn’t move at all when level. The large grips for dips are awesome. It was worth the money for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazingg!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best equipment I could buy.. all the other ones seemed to unstable and would move when I would do pull ups or dips but this is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly well built!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly well built! This thing is built like a brick s__thouse! VERY heavy duty. Assembly was very simple and did not need an assistant. Instructions were super simple...if you can make toast you can put this thing together. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality product.. i can definitely suggest.. you get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.author: Saner K.

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I own the best pull-up/dip station I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding product! Takes a little time to assemble but its worth it. Very sturdy! 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: kicksdad

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Sturdy as hell, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: The hardware looks fine. However there have many many connection parts on ...
customer_reviews.text: The hardware looks fine. However there have many many connection parts on the `part list` are missing. There is no way to install it and totally useless for us now. No easy way to contact the support, feel disappointed for such a expense. We usually buy stuff on Amazon and this is the first time so many pieces are missing :(
customer_reviews.author: E W

customer_reviews.title: Big item . Too big to return . Just need missing parts !
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts still haven’t heard back from manufacturer . Sent email !
customer_reviews.author: Luis Magana

customer_reviews.title: Home gem
customer_reviews.text: Superb, you’ll love it. On a side note I’d suggest getting in addition resistant bands and grip hooks for pull-ups and dips - will be easier as they require some pre-existing strength.
customer_reviews.author: Maximum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This power tower is built very well and was easy to assemble! Great all around body workout!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Anthony

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for: great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. I used a friend’s Weider version of the power tower and it was wobbly and so-so. This product though is top of the line. Solid. Versatile. You will be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this overall. Price, assembly, sturdiness, and function are all satisfactory. Hard to find all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mota

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Sturdy Machine
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what the description says, very sturdy, somewhat heavy.
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well built. I wasn't sure about spending that much money but it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Gym grade.
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier than I expected. Gym grade equipment. Worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a commercial Gym
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. I'm glad that I decided to spend a bit more than I had budgeted. Worth every penny. Though it was pretty easy to put together the size made it a bit cumbersome - if you can get someone to help, it would make the process a lot easier. A word of caution: make sure you know where you are going to put this. It is not easy to move around, Despite this, I'm giving it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC!! I use it twice a day. VERY stable and strong! Must have! More affordable than paying the monthly gym membership!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sabuda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy if you're a big guy !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 240lb Service member who was looking for a heavy duty power tower and this is it. Doesn't move or shake on any of the exercises that I use on it. Recommend buy for anyone looking for a quality product, it is expensive but it'll last.
customer_reviews.author: MericanPatriot0

customer_reviews.title: So good I had it to buy another one for my brother’s home.
customer_reviews.text: So good I had it to buy another one for my brother’s home.
customer_reviews.author: CSR77

product_meta.title: Fitness Reality X-Class High Capacity Multi-Function Power Tower
product_meta.description: Fitness Reality. Real people. Real results. Get the same intense gym-quality workout at home with the Fitness Reality X-Class multi-function power tower. Work your ABS and master your leg raises! designed with a heavy duty steel tube frame, the Fitness Reality X-Class power tower can support up to 400 lbs weight capacity. Featuring an ergonomically designed 3" thick angled backrest for Real comfort, 2 adjustable handle bars with foam rollers and 7 mounting positions, a Pull-Up/chin-up station and a dip station etc., the Fitness Reality X-Class power tower will provide you with over 20 different exercises to train your different muscle groups. So train hard and get the results you want with the Fitness Reality high capacity X-Class multi-function power tower. Features: distance between the dip handles is 26". 2 adjustable handle bars with foam rollers for multiple exercise. 7 mounting positions for adjustable handle bars. Large 2" thick foam dipped hand grips for extra comfort and sure grip while exercising. Leg raise handles with 2 adjustable positions. 3 position adjustable stability beam for additional safety and stability. This station will work lower and upper core abdominal. Strength training exercises include dips, sit ups, push-ups, pull-ups, chin-ups, vertical knee and leg raises (VKR's), progressive push-ups/pull-ups/chin-ups/single leg squat and stretch etc. The main frame is angled so your back can rest on the cushion support to stabilize any side to side movement. Step support on the main frame for easy step up for performing dips and leg raises. 4 available bolt holes for mounting the unit to the ground for extra stability. Some Assembly required. Set up dimensions: 63.4 L x 49 W x 83 h inches. Set up weight: 150 lbs. Limited lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty powder coated steel tube frame with up to 400 lbs. Weight capacity
2 adjustable handle bars with foam rollers for multiple exercise with 7 mounting positions
Ergonomically designed 3" thick angled backrest for real comfort. 2.25" thick angled forearm cushions for comfortable forearm and Elbow support
The dip station will strengthen your triceps. 3 position adjustable stability beam for additional safety and stability
Multiple grip pull-up/chin-up station will help you strengthen and sculpt your back, lats and biceps, triceps, chest through different hand positions
